QuestData.Title: Dark Grimoire: Breaching the Barrier
QuestData.Description:
The components have been gathered and the "Arcane Bunker Buster" is assembled. Hopefully, this should pack enough punch to take out the barrier.
There's only one way to find out...
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy the ancient barrier below Socrethar's Rise and claim the Grimoire of the Nameless Void.
